RenoiseScriptingTool.Name: Instrument Shortcuts Additions
RenoiseScriptingTool.Author: Vincent Voois [ http://tinyurl.com/vvrns ]
RenoiseScriptingTool.Description: Adds a few extra shortcuts to the instrument and sample slots area. The new shortcuts are by default not mapped to anything, but can be mapped manually in Renoises Preferences/Keys/Instrument Box settings.
